dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
S. A. Eslami
L. Van Gool

dcterms:description: PASCAL VOC 2012 contains 20 object classes with one background class. The augmented dataset includes 10582, 1449, and 1456 images for training, validation, and test sets respectively.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: R. Mottaghi
X. Chen
X. Liu
N.-G. Cho
S.-W. Lee
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
A. Yuille
dcterms:description: PASCAL-Context provides dense labels for the whole image with 59 classes and a background class. It includes 4,998 training images and 5,105 test images.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-Context

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: Cityscapes consists of images for 50 cities in different seasons and is annotated with 19 categories. It contains 2975, 500, and 1525 fine-labeled images for training, validation, and test respectively.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
